articles.title: Several suspects facing charges after police recover meth, cocaine in Roslindale drug bust
articles.description:

articles.title: Pedestrian, 68, struck and killed by SUV in Haverhill
articles.description:
The Volvo, carrying an infant, was first hit by a pick-up truck before hitting a third vehicle, the DA said.
